name: ADAM_0.1.1
description:
Tags #Shooter #Platformer

Pitch
In this action platformer you will progress to the top by using weaponised 
prostheses that you will take from your ennemies

Description 
You are Adam, the CEO of an R&D company on cybernetic improvements.
A Criminal organization someday decides to take control of the business by force,remove Adam's
improved members and expel his old allies and retain him in the company at the bottom of the
hierarchy to add insult to the injury .
Adam will not tolerate something like this and will take back is buisness floor by floor.

This is still an alpha version of this project we will add mutch more content and polish 
as quickly as we can.

Maybe you want to help us and anwer some of our questions?
https://docs.google.com/forms/u/0/d/e/1FAIpQLSeUgZ9MnsaQPSMwf5BeRdn20pzp5kc6zgJH...

Enjoy
